extendedInfo.description: Understanding the responsibility of education for students, FNT Software Solutions Pvt Ltd has launched the Worlds No.1 Students portal called Studentsarea portal (www.studentsarea.com) for students.Studentsarea is the worldâs No.1 students portal headquartered in HSR Layout, Bangalore, India. Studentsarea protal has been developed as a mission mode of one stop services for all school, college and graduate students around the world & it is very extensive and offering wide range of educational services for students and regular updates on following informations:-Latest News â provides latest news from India and the world. Get current top college and university educations, science and technology, business, sports and entertainment headlines with videos, photo galleries and more.

reviews.title: great work
reviews.comment: Nice to get all news updations through online, its a better apps for al academics.. great job by the company. Its totally exciting to see such a web portal & mobile apps for students. great efforts
reviews.author: Guna Sekaran
